meanings.definition: A person who cleans surfaces by scrubbing.
meanings.sent1: The scrubbers worked hard to make the floor shiny.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired new scrubbers to keep everything clean.
meanings.sent3: The scrubbers joked about having to scrub the floors again.
meanings.sent4: She was a scrubber, tirelessly cleaning every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The scrubbers scrubbed away the dirt, revealing a sparkling surface.

meanings.definition: A device used to clean or remove impurities from a gas stream.
meanings.sent1: The factory installed scrubbers to reduce pollution.
meanings.sent2: The scrubbers in the chimney helped clean the smoke before it was released.
meanings.sent3: The scrubbers in the air ducts hummed as they purified the air.
meanings.sent4: The scrubbers worked like magic, clearing the gas of any impurities.
meanings.sent5: The scrubbers efficiently removed all the harmful particles from the gas stream.

meanings.definition: A type of cleaning tool or implement.
meanings.sent1: She used the scrubbers to clean the bathtub.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen scrubbers were perfect for removing tough stains.
meanings.sent3: The scrubbers in her cleaning kit were her favorite tools.
meanings.sent4: The scrubbers made the cleaning job much easier.
meanings.sent5: The scrubbers were essential for keeping the house spotless.
